panels.description: The rate of query operations the node has received.

panels.description: The number of incoming connections from clients to the node.
panels.title: Current connections

panels.description: The rate of read and write operations performed by the node.
panels.title: Read and write operations

panels.description: The latency time for read and write operations performed by this node.
panels.title: Read and write latency / $__interval

panels.description: The number of deadlocks that have occurred for the database lock.

panels.title: Database wait count / $__interval

panels.description: The time spent waiting for the database lock acquisition.

panels.description: The number of deadlocks that have occurred for the collection lock.
